LanguageData.blood_flower.label: Blood flower
LanguageData.blood_flower.description: It is a blood flower that bears blood berries. It is mainly used for eating vampires when needed.
LanguageData.Blood_Mind_table.label: Blood powered workbench
LanguageData.Blood_Mind_table.description: It is a workbench that uses blood as power.
LanguageData.spirit_stone_well.label: spirit stone tower
LanguageData.spirit_stone_well.description: A tower that produces spirit stones.
LanguageData.high_spirit_costume.label: high spirit costume
LanguageData.high_spirit_costume.description: These costumes were said to have been used by wizards with high ranks. They have higher performance than normal spirit costumes, but they are applied differently.
LanguageData.bloodpack_manufacturing.label: Produce blood pack
LanguageData.bloodpack_manufacturing.description: Squeez blood berries to produce blood pack.
LanguageData.mental_weapon.label: mental weapon
LanguageData.mental_weapon.description: A rudimentary staff weapon made from an ore called a spirit stone.
LanguageData.mental_clothing.label: Mental costumes
LanguageData.mental_clothing.description: These are costumes that prevent mental blockages.
LanguageData.Ice_Excavation.label: ice shards
LanguageData.nano_blaster.label: nano blaster
LanguageData.combat_Overwatch_system.label: spirit stone tower
LanguageData.combat_Overwatch_system.description: A tower that produces spirit stones.
LanguageData.observation_heavy_drone.label: Overwatch Enhancement System
LanguageData.observation_heavy_drone.description: We manufacture combat-specific drones and tactical drones.
LanguageData.observation_carrier_system.label: Overwatch Carrier System
LanguageData.observation_carrier_system.description: You can build a medium mechanoid called the Overwatch Carrier.
LanguageData.observation_Electric_generator.label: Remnants of the Overwatch system
LanguageData.observation_Electric_generator.descripti: It is the remnant of technology left over from Overwatch, and contains many skills.
LanguageData.Ghost_weapon.label: foreign cosmic gift
LanguageData.Ghost_weapon.description: An unknown gift from outer space.
LanguageData.star_song.label: The song of stars from outer space
LanguageData.star_song.description: "Seeds from outer space grow into trees, stars from outer space are singing and whispering."
LanguageData.flame_weapon.label: phoenix feather
LanguageData.flame_weapon.description: A feather that emits unknown flames, a burning bird that only appears in legends.
LanguageData.Ice_Moon.label: Fragments of the Ice Moon
LanguageData.Ice_Moon.description: Living, but non-living, frozen debris scattered by an asteroid impact long ago.
LanguageData.spirit_weapon.label: Records of Ancient Sanguiophage
LanguageData.spirit_weapon.description: The records left by those who longed for eternal life before they became the ancient Saengwiopage and the records after that.
LanguageData.eternal_Bionic.label: cycle of eternal life
LanguageData.eternal_Bionic.description: This is a record of bioengineers developed (living and moving) to obtain eternal life long ago before becoming a biohazard.
LanguageData.Sanguophages_Death_Nexus.label: Sanguiophage Death Nexus
LanguageData.Sanguophages_Death_Nexus.description: These are the new connectors that will be connected to the Sanguiophage Death Hall.
LanguageData.code_geass.label: blood code needle(incomplete.)
LanguageData.code_geass.description: A code needle that activates abilities using vampire blood.
LanguageData.magic_recordbook.label: record book
LanguageData.magic_recordbook.description: You can find a workbench where you can make various records and books, and the materials needed to make Hemera books.
LanguageData.magic_book_A.label: Hemera Book Level 1
LanguageData.magic_book_A.description: You can craft a book that unlocks the Hemera ability.
LanguageData.magic_book_B.label: Hemera Book Level 2
LanguageData.magic_book_B.description: You can craft books that unlock new Hemera abilities.
